name: digit-recognizer
description: ReactフロントエンドとNode.jsバックエンドを使用したフルスタック数字認識アプリケーション

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.dev:stop: lsof -ti:3000,5000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No processes found'
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run install-python && npm run train-model
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix client && npm run lint:fix --prefix server
